get.summary: Gets information about all pools in the authoritative pool list.

parameters.name: Accept-Language
parameters.description: The language in which the client is requesting to receive localized pool names/descriptions.

200.description: A successful response including the identification and status of each pool.

Content-Language.description: The language in which the service is returning pool names/descriptions.

post.description: Determines which pools to search, issues search requests against them and sorts and aggregates those responses.

parameters.name: Accept-Language
parameters.description: The language in which the client is requesting to receive localized warnings, errors, and pool facet/field labels.

requestBody.description: Information defining the search to be performed.

Content-Language.description: The language in which the service is returning warnings and pool facet/field labels.

400.description: A failed response resulting from a bad request.

Content-Language.description: The language in which the service is returning an error.

UnauthorizedError.description: Access token is missing or invalid

SearchRequest.description: All the information that defines a search.  Until more is decided this only includes the users query, facets, filters, and the specified search target. In the future it will contain all the things associated with a user's preferences and other criteria that might affect the targets searched, the subset return, ranking, verbosity of returned results, etc.

query.description: A query formatted as defined by the specification here: https://github.com/uvalib/v4-api/tree/master/query-syntax

facet.description: Requests a single facet, or all facets supported by a pool if the special value "all" is provided.

Pagination.description: Information about the subset of the full results set is being requested.

start.description: The index of the first item to fetch.

rows.description: The number of items to request

Filter.description: The information needed to request a single filter.

facet_id.description: The identifier of the facet to filter on.

value.description: The facet value to use for filtering.

Filters.description: A list of filters to apply to a search.  These will be facet and value identifiers that the client has received in a previous search.

target_pool.description: The URL of the pool to feature.  Specifying a valid pool URL will override the normal search behavior.

excluded_pool.description: URLs of pools the user wishes to ignore.  These pools will not be searched.

PoolListing.description: All the pools that are in the authoritative pool list.

PoolResults.description: A list of search results sorted from most to least relevant.
